channel.title: What Do I need to change this to?

item.title: What Do I need to change this to?
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

Still getting this…

Compiler will begin compiling soon- Nick
NPCHandler.java:2030: class, interface, or enum expected
} else if (npcs.npcType == 3084) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2034: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs.textupdateRequired = true }
^

2 errors
You have successfully compiled
Press any key to continue

The arrows (^) point to the lines that need to be fixed.

I HAVE this:

} else if (npcs.npcType == 3084) {
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textupdateRequired = true }
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“F 3 A R D”))
npcs.textUp
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: What Do I need to change this to?
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

What do I need to change this to?

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 3084) {
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textupdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“F 3 A R D”));
npcs[i].textUp

This is the error I get:
Compiler will begin compiling soon- Nick
NPCHandler.java:2030: class, interface, or enum expected
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 3084) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2034: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textupdateRequired = true;
^
NPCHandler.java:2035: class, interface, or enum expected
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“F 3 A R D”));
^
NPCHandler.java:2036: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUp
^
4 errors
You have successfully compiled
Press any key to continue . . .

-Nick.
